title: Implement admin panel with user management

requirements: Create admin panel with protected admin-only route
Implement user management with GET /api/admin/users, PUT /api/admin/users/:id/status
Add user statistics display with GET /api/admin/users/stats
Create points adjustment interface with POST /api/admin/users/points
Add inspiration prompts management with GET /api/admin/inspirations
Create admin dashboard with system overview
Implement role-based access control and permission checks
acceptance: Admin page created: verify by test -f frontend/app/admin/page.tsx
User management component: verify by find frontend/components/admin/ -name '*User*' | wc -l >= 1
Admin API integration: verify by grep -r '/api/admin/' frontend/lib/ | wc -l >= 5
Role-based access control: verify by grep -r 'admin|role' frontend/lib/auth.ts | wc -l >= 1
Statistics dashboard: verify by find frontend/components/admin/ -name '*Stats*' -o -name '*Dashboard*' | wc -l >= 1
